comment: Wayd Idle is GRAMMY NOMINATED! He is probably the best voice professor the state of Georgia let alone Kennesaw will ever see. He will truly motivate you until he has lectured you to the point of having tears in his own eyes. He meets everyone where they are and everyone will improve in insane almost impossible ways. You would be lucky to have him!

The absolute best teacher I've ever had. He cares about you as a person and helps you find your voice by teaching exactly what you need in that moment. He is also an amazing singer. The lessons are always productive, fun, and inspiring.
He is attentive to his students and pushes them to do their best. He reminds you to never give up and helps you figure out what works best for your voice.
